item.title: Join
item.description: May my timing be appropriate and crisp According to Your will May Your animals be swift and decisive Mightily dodging Sofiaâ€™s tread May these furry fellas miss us May my braking be prudent and sure May their appropriate signs be taken And understood and received accordingly May these signs never result in any death, injury Or damage May I also be kindly reminded to further Not to partake of the death of animals in my
